sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描绘了当灵魂依附于濒死的动物时人类肉体的窘境。
然而，这种窘境终究会熬过去的。

sentences.english: I am in the identical predicament with yourself.
sentences.chinese: 我和你处于同样的窘境之中。

sentences.english: The church women outnumbering men in a small dilemma has kept and sisters live in fear of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 而教会女多男少的窘境，更让姐妹对婚姻惶恐不安。

sentences.english: Having money clearly takes the sting out of adversities.
sentences.chinese: 金钱显然缓解了这种窘境。

sentences.english: Rightists don’t revel in the plight of workers either.
sentences.chinese: 右派也不会对工人阶层所处的窘境而欢欣。

sentences.english: It occurred to me that in the midst of this quandary my own primal question had finally been answered.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的窘境中，我忽然想到当初那个问题的答案。

sentences.english: For example, at the wedding in Cana he kept a young couple from being embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 比如，在迦拿的婚礼上，他让一对年轻夫妇脱离窘境。

sentences.english: As more species migrate, new quandaries are likely to arise.
sentences.chinese: 随着更多的物种迁徙，新的窘境还会出现。

sentences.english: So Kay has been in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 所以，Kay陷入了进退两难的窘境。

sentences.english: I fell asleep last night thinking about my predicament.
Copyright protection poses legal headaches all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 版权保护一经使各国陷入法律窘境。

sentences.english: His distress encourages some circling bansheerays to attack.
sentences.chinese: 他的窘境鼓舞一些盘旋的斑溪飞下来攻击。

sentences.english: Soddy would not have been surprised at our current state of affairs.
sentences.chinese: 索迪估计不会对我们今天的窘境感到丝毫惊讶。

sentences.english: He debarrassed her of an empty cup at the tea-party.
sentences.chinese: 在茶会上他使她杯子不空，使她摆脱了窘境。

sentences.english: They then divided into sub can not think, want and do not add the dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 两人这时陷入想分分不了，想和和不拢的窘境。

definition: to make progress only with great difficulty (idiom)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
lit. pulling on the lapels exposes the elbows (idiom)/strapped for cash/unable to make ends meet
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
